forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Gif Optimizer

comments.text: Hi! Here's what's new in version 160.6 (you're on [version]). Hope it's useful!
Now when pasting a Gif URL into the browser dialog, it asks if you want to use the Gif Enlarger to better fill the whole surface!
( More parameters are described at anyland.com/scripting/#thenShow )
... You can then also copy that resulting URL to use with the "When starts then show web ..." command.
The max length for entering URLs into the Browser dialog has been increased from 60 to 200!
And Update 160.8: The last page of base shapes had a cube overlay the first shape for a while, that's fixed now! Thx Gold & Zid!

thread.latestCommentText: And Update 160.8: The last page of base shapes had a cube overlay the first shape for a while, that's fixed now! Thx Gold & Zid!
